Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2007 09:35PM juliehere wrote: The aching is more on the outer side. I guess it feels like tennis elbow. Interesting, last night I used the trampoline (rebounder) to see it if helped. Afterwards, I noticed it did not hurt a all. However, it is aching this morning when I move it. I guess I need to jump everyday to get benefits and see if I get more improvement.
